description.raw:
The homebrew `python` package now refers to python3. Thus it no longer has the `pip2` command, so some gazebo builds are failing:

~~~
++ brew install python
Warning: python 3.6.4_3 is already installed
++ export PYTHONPATH=/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages:
++ PYTHONPATH=/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages:
++ pip2 install lxml
./scripts/jenkins-scripts/lib/project-default-devel-homebrew-amd64.bash: line 77:
 pip2: command not found
~~~

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1422/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1423/

So switch back to the unversioned version of pip, which is now available again. Also, update `flaky_junit_merge.py` to support python3. Also update the cleanup script to remove python site-packages for all versions.

Test build:

:red_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1424

:red_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1425/

:yellow_heart: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1426/ but all the gui tests are marked as failures due to a python3 issue

:grey_question: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1428/ I aborted it early, but the gui tests are working again with a special branch of gazebo

:blue_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat5-homebrew-amd64/32

:blue_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat4-homebrew-amd64/61

:red_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-homebrew-amd64/8/

:yellow_heart: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-homebrew-amd64/9/

found another python3 issue in the failed gazebo build (fixed in abc3583), and I found an issue with protobuf (reported upstream [here](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/issues/24815))
description.html:
The homebrew python package now refers to python3. Thus it no longer has the pip2 command, so some gazebo builds are failing:

++ brew install python
Warning: python 3.6.4_3 is already installed
++ export PYTHONPATH=/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages:
++ PYTHONPATH=/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages:
++ pip2 install lxml
./scripts/jenkins-scripts/lib/project-default-devel-homebrew-amd64.bash: line 77:
 pip2: command not found
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1422/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1423/

So switch back to the unversioned version of pip, which is now available again. Also, update flaky_junit_merge.py to support python3. Also update the cleanup script to remove python site-packages for all versions.

Test build:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1424

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1425/

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1426/ but all the gui tests are marked as failures due to a python3 issue

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1428/ I aborted it early, but the gui tests are working again with a special branch of gazebo

https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat5-homebrew-amd64/32

https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat4-homebrew-amd64/61

https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-homebrew-amd64/8/

https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-homebrew-amd64/9/

found another python3 issue in the failed gazebo build (fixed in abc3583), and I found an issue with protobuf (reported upstream here)

title: Brew: use python3
